title: 'Boys and Girl - DeMarcus Lawrence Agent David Canter Discusses COVID Offseason for Agents, Inside D-Law Contract Negotiation, 2020 Playing Decision
itunes:title: 'Boys and Girl - DeMarcus Lawrence Agent David Canter Discusses COVID Offseason for Agents, Inside D-Law Contract Negotiation, 2020 Playing Decision
description:
On today’s episode of the 'Boys and Girl Podcast, Jane and Bobby are joined by NFL agent David Canter. David discusses the NFL in the age of Covid, how the Cowboys negotiate big money deals, and what his client DeMarcus Lawrence plans to do for the 2020 season.

Follow Jane and Bobby on Twitter and subscribe to get all the latest inside information from two of the most connected people in the Cowboys’ community.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
